section.title: Line column charts
section.p: The line column chart combines the column and line charts. Your search needs at least one attribute and two measures to be represented as a line column chart.

section.title: Understand line column charts
section.p: Line column charts display one measure as a column chart and the other as a line chart. Each of these measures has its own y-axis.
You can choose to enable shared y-axis by clicking the link icon found under Edit chart configuration.

section.title: Line stacked column charts
section.p: This chart is similar to the line column chart, except that it divides its columns with an attribute in the legend. There are two y-axes, one for each measure.
You can choose to enable shared y-axis by clicking the link icon found under Edit chart configuration.
